src:
Preview Timnas U-19 Indonesia Vs Timor Leste di Kualifikasi AFC
05 Nov 2019, 23:16 by Tempo.co, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Timnas U-19 Indonesia siap tempur untuk menghadapi Timor Lester dalam laga pertama Grup K Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020, Rabu ini, 6 November 2019. Pertandingan akan berlangsung di Stadion Madya Gelora Bung Karno, Jakarta, mulai pukul 19.00 WIB dan disiarkan langsung RCTI.
Pelatih Timnas U-19, Fakhri Husaini, mengatakan para pemainnya sudah tidak sabar untuk bermain. “Pemain sangat antusias dan termotivasi untuk bisa tampil di pertandingan nanti. Mereka ingin memberikan yang terbaik untuk bangsa dan negara melalui sepak bola,” kata dia seperti dikutip laman PSSI.
Ada pergantian pemain dalam skuad timnas Indonesia. Muhammad Fadhil Adhitya Akshah mengalami cedera, dan digantikan oleh Fadillah Nur Rahman dari Diklat Ragunan.
“Ada satu pemain harus diganti, yakni Fadil. Dia mengalami cedera di latihan terakhir dan diganti Fadilah Nur Rahman dari Diklat Ragunan. Namun secara keseluruhan, semua pemain siap,” kata Fakri.
Fakhri juga menyatakan bahwa timnya sudah melakukan persiapan maksimal untuk kualifikasi ini. Waktu empat minggu yang ada, dimanfaatkan untuk memperbaiki segala kekurangan setelah mendapatkan peringkat ketiga pada Piala AFF lalu.
“Persiapan kami sekitar empat minggu setelah Piala AFF. Pemain sangat antusias, termotivasi, dan semangat tampil di kualifikasi ini. Mereka ingin memberikan yang terbaik,” kata Fakhri.
Sementara itu, Timor Leste memperkuat pertahanan untuk mengantisipasi ‘daya ledak’ para penyerang Indonesia. “Kami fokus ke pertahanan karena saya tidak mau kami kecolongan gol dari Indonesia,” ujar asisten pelatih Timor Leste Eduardo Pereira, Selasa.
Amiruddin Bagus Kahfi menjadi salah satu penyerang timnas U-19 Indonesia yang sangat diwaspadai Timor Leste. Namun, Eduardo menegaskan tidak akan ada pemain timnya yang bertugas khusus untuk menghambat pergerakan Bagus. “Kami akan menjaga zona dia,” ujar Eduardo.
Menurut Eduardo Pereira, Timor Leste akan mengandalkan serangan balik untuk menembus pertahanan Indonesia.
Timor Leste mengklaim mereka memiliki pemain berkualitas untuk menjalankan taktik tersebut. “Kami juga memiliki lini serang yang cukup cepat dan bisa diandalkan,” kata Eduardo.
Pemain yang akan sangat diandalkan oleh Timor Leste di laga kontra Indonesia adalah Paulo Domingos Gali Da Costa Freitas, pencetak gol terbanyak di Piala AFF U-15 tahun 2019.
Meski sempat cedera, pemain yang sempat diduga mencuri umur ketika berlaga di Piala AFF U-19 itu dinyatakan fit berlaga menghadapi Indonesia sejak awal. “Dia sudah pulih dan siap menjadi starter,” ujar Eduardo.
Sebelum laga Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020 Indonesia versus Timor Leste, pada pukul 15.30 WIB akan digelar laga Korea Utara melawan Hong Kong di tempat yang sama.
text:
Preview of U-19 Indonesia Vs Timor Leste National Team in AFC Qualifications
05 Nov 2019, 23:16 by Tempo.co, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Indonesian U-19 national team is ready to fight to face Timor Lester in the first match of Group K AFC U-19 2020 Qualification, this Wednesday, November 6, 2019. The match will take place at Madya Gelora Bung Karno Stadium, Jakarta, starting 19:00 WIB and broadcast live RCTI.
U-19 national team coach, Fakhri Husaini, said the players were impatient to play. "Players are very enthusiastic and motivated to be able to appear in the match later. They want to provide the best for the nation and country through football, "he was quoted as saying on the PSSI website.
There is a change of players in the Indonesian national team squad. Muhammad Fadhil Adhitya Akshah was injured, and was replaced by Fadillah Nur Rahman from Ragunan Education and Training Center.
"There is one player that must be replaced, namely Fadil. He suffered an injury in the last practice and was replaced by Fadilah Nur Rahman from Ragunan Education and Training Center. But overall, all the players are ready, "Fakri said.
Fakhri also stated that his team had made maximum preparation for this qualification. The remaining four weeks are used to correct any deficiencies after getting third in the last AFF Cup.
"Our preparations are about four weeks after the AFF Cup. Players are very enthusiastic, motivated, and enthusiastic about performing in this qualification. They want to give their best, "said Fakhri.
Meanwhile, Timor Leste is strengthening its defense to anticipate the 'explosive power' of Indonesian attackers. "We are focused on defense because I do not want us to miss a goal from Indonesia," said East Timor assistant coach Eduardo Pereira on Tuesday.
Amiruddin Bagus Kahfi was one of the attackers on the Indonesian U-19 national team who was very wary of Timor Leste. However, Eduardo stressed there would be no team of his team specifically assigned to hamper the movement of Bagus. "We will guard her zone," Eduardo said.
According to Eduardo Pereira, East Timor would rely on counterattacks to penetrate Indonesia's defense.
Timor Leste claims they have quality players to carry out this tactic. "We also have a fairly fast and reliable attack line," Eduardo said.
The player who will be highly relied upon by Timor Leste in the fight against Indonesia is Paulo Domingos Gali Da Costa Freitas, the top scorer in the 2019 U-15 AFF Cup.
Despite being injured, the player who was suspected of stealing his age when competing in the AFF U-19 Cup was declared fit to compete against Indonesia from the start. "He has recovered and is ready to become a starter," said Eduardo.
Before the AFC U-19 2020 Qualification Cup match Indonesia versus Timor Leste, at 15.30 West Indonesia Time a North Korea match against Hong Kong will be held at the same place.
